text: The Nissan Juke is a Mini SUV that is built by the Nissan. The Juke has had 2 generations during its time. The assembly for the Nissan Juke is in Oppama, Japan and Sunderland, United Kingdom. The Juke made its debut at the 2010 Geneva Motor Show in March, and made its North America debut at the 2010 New York International Auto Show. It entered its second generation in late 2019. ==References== ==Other websites== * Juke Category:2010s automobiles
title: Nissan Juke
